text: Mbega uwashinze umushingi w’inyubakwa yiwe mugutinya Imana hamwe nugusaba imbabazi siwe mwiza, canke uwashinze umushingi w’inyubakwa yiwe hejuru y’impande y’ikinogo kimanyagurikako ibinonko vyaco, hanyuma urwo ruhome rugahenukirayo hamwe nawe mumuriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, n’Imana ntishobora kurongora abantu bayihemukira
